results.description: Verify `execute manual-fix` command registration and argument parsing

payload.evidence: Verified via unit test: command registration, argument parsing, and validation of --agent flag.
payload.notes: Tests passed: 'registers execute manual-fix command', 'CLI exits with code 1...', 'CLI accepts --agent...'

results.description: Verify filtering of `manual-fix` issues from issue file

payload.evidence: Verified via unit test: issues file scanning and filtering for 'manual-fix' status.
payload.notes: Test passed: 'scans issues for current iteration, filters manual-fix status...'

results.description: Verify behavior when no matching issues are found

payload.evidence: Verified via new unit test: correct handling (graceful exit) when 0 manual-fix issues are found.
payload.notes: Test passed: 'TC-003: handles 0 manual-fix issues gracefully'

results.description: Verify sequential processing loop for multiple issues

payload.evidence: Verified via unit test: sequential processing loop iterates through multiple issues.
payload.notes: Test passed: 'presents manual-fix issues one by one...'

results.description: Verify agent is initialized with correct issue context

payload.evidence: Verified via unit test: prompt construction includes issue details (ID, title, description).
Verified via unit test: mocked interactive agent invocation and loop behavior.
payload.notes: Test passed: 'presents manual-fix issues one by one...' (mocks interactive flag)

results.description: Verify "Mark as fixed" updates issue status

payload.evidence: Verified via unit test: 'fixed' action updates status in JSON file.
Verified via unit test: 'skip' action preserves existing status.
payload.notes: Test passed: 'US-003-AC03: skip leaves issue status as manual-fix...'
